description:
For long rides without regrets. With a female-specific chamois, these knickers make saddle time a little more awesome. The fabric offers light compression with impressive stretch. Reflective patches on the back help keep you extra visible on the road.

  • Female-specific KISS Air2 Donna dual-density chamois provides dampens vibrations and cushions your ride
  • Endurance Evolution fabric with spandex provides light compression and a great range of motion
  • Raw edge hem and vertical silicone grippers reduce pressure on your thighs
  • Body-mapped design provides a great fit in riding position
  • Castelli rates these for temps between 12°C to 28°C
  • Reflective details
name: Castelli Velocissima 3 Knickers - Women's
